name: Pop Cat: The Video Game (GameBoy Edition)
name_original: Pop Cat: The Video Game (GameBoy Edition)
description:
THE premier clicker game on the Game Boy! Play as hero, POP CAT, and try to pop 999 times. Maybe you do it, maybe you can't. Are you a bad enough POP CAT?

~~ In browser controls ~~

A button - X

B button - Z

D-Pad - Arrow keys

Start - Enter 

Select - Spacebar
